div.div: Bake 1 unvigintillion cookies in one ascension.
Complete the second chapter of the tutorial campaign.
After building the Jebel Barkal wonder, earn 28 Faith per turn on its tile
Win a regular game as Lady Six Sky.
Build a house in a mushroom biome and have the Truffle move in.
Defeat Deerclops, the chilly one-eyed monstrosity from a foreign land.
